title: New Season Placement is Demoralizing!!!
body:
I complained to riot so much!!! I won 8/10 of my Placement Promos because of the new season, I had a positive KDA in majority of my matches or equal, and boom got thrown into Bronze5!! I climbed last season out of Bronze5 to Bronze3 xD I just think it sucks players that put a lot of effort into doing well in these matches get hard done by. 
I'm literally ready to stop playing League of Legends. 
TY Astrozoid.

replies.body: Be happy u got that, i  won 10 games and got b5

Hey there Astrozoid,

This board is mainly focused on Help & Support regarding technical issues with the game, your post would be better suited for the [Gameplay & Strategy Board](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy) or the [General Discussion Board](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion), however i'll answer here to give you an idea as to what occurred.

The placement seems accurate to me, if you were bronze 3 last season playing your 10 placement matches this season will most likely result in you being matched up against bronze 4-5 players. Your current estimated MMR is 778, this is around bronze 4-5.

The best thing you can do if you feel you deserve a higher rank is to work your way up.
